name: prefix
description: View or change the bot's prefix for this server

new_prefix.description: New prefix to set (leave empty to view current)

responses.current_prefix_description:
The current prefix is: `{currentPrefix}`
Default prefix: `{defaultPrefix}`

**Examples:**
â€¢ `{currentPrefix}play lofi`
â€¢ `{currentPrefix}help`
responses.no_permission: âŒ You need the `Manage Server` permission to change the prefix
responses.prefix_too_long: âŒ The prefix cannot be longer than 10 characters
responses.prefix_has_spaces: âŒ The prefix cannot contain spaces
responses.prefix_starts_with_slash: âŒ The prefix cannot start with `/`
responses.prefix_updated_description:
**Previous:** `{oldPrefix}`
**New:** `{newPrefix}`

**Examples:**
â€¢ `{newPrefix}play lofi`
â€¢ `{newPrefix}help`

ğŸ’¡ *If you didn't add a symbol at the end, `!` was added automatically*
responses.error_saving: âŒ Error saving the prefix. Try again.
